contentrichtext.text: {{expand language|topic=|langcode=de|otherarticle=Bedburg|date=March 2013}} {{Infobox German Location |Art = Stadt |Name = Bedburg |Wappen = Wappen von Bedburg.png |image_photo = Schloss Bedburg 6.jpg |image_caption = Castle |lat_deg = 51 |lat_min = 00 |lat_sec = 00 |lon_deg = 6 |lon_min = 33 |lon_sec = 45 |Lageplan = Bedburg in BM.svg |Bundesland = North Rhine-Westphalia |Regierungsbezirk = Köln |Kreis = Rhein-Erft-Kreis |Höhe = 70 |Fläche = 80.21 |Einwohner = 24926 |Stand = 2006-12-31 |PLZ = 50181 |Vorwahl = 02272 |Kfz = BM |Gemeindeschlüssel = 05 3 62 004 |Straße = Am Rathaus 1 |Website = [http://www.bedburg.de/ www.bedburg.de] |Bürgermeister = Gunnar Koerdt }} '''Bedburg''' is a town in the [[Rhein-Erft-Kreis]], [[North Rhine-Westphalia]] of [[Germany]] with 25,000 residents. The town is documented as existing as early as 893.{{Citation needed|date=May 2008}} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.bedburg.de/language/engl/historen.htm Official site] {{Cities and towns in Rhein-Erft-Kreis (district)}} {{RheinErftKreis-geo-stub}}
